Class DefaultChartFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.chart.DefaultChartFont
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultFont

    public final class DefaultChartFont
extends Object
implements IsDefaultFont
    Defaults for font option element, based on chart type.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
